sentences: Ta on juba rääkinud kõik oma arvamused ära.
Meie oleme pikalt rääkinud sellest projektist.
context: Rääkinud is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'rääkima', which means 'to speak' or 'to talk'. It indicates an action that has been completed in the past. This form is used with auxiliary verbs like 'olema' (to be) to create compound tenses, such as 'olen rääkinud' (I have spoken) or 'on rääkinud' (he/she/it has spoken).
